name: Video Game Character Generator
description:
Press Enter to generate a unique character idea. 

  • Alignment: Is your character good or bad and is your character chaotic or lawful? 
  • Role: What is the narrative purpose of your character? 
  • Class: What is the profession of your character? 
  • Twist: What makes your character interesting or unique? 
  • Weapon: How does your character fight or defend itself? 
  • Color: What is a recurring color theme in the character?
